parseCoordinates

public static java.util.ArrayList<Point> parseCoordinates(java.lang.String coord,
                                                          java.lang.String regex,
                                                          boolean polygon)
parse coordinates and return as arraylist of points (de.javagis.jgis.geometry.Point)

Parameters:
String - coord - string with coordinates
String - regex - seperator between two coordinate strings
boolean - polygon - if true, the last coordinate will be ignored (in polygones first = last coordinate)
Returns:
ArrayList - arraylist of point-objects

public static boolean getLatitudeFormat(java.lang.String inputLat)
get latitude format

Parameters:
String - inputLat - string with latitude
Returns:
boolean - true: coordinates in DMS (Degrees, Minutes, Seconds); false: coordinates in DD (Decimal Degrees)

Returns:

convertDMStoDD

public static double[] convertDMStoDD(int latDeg,
                                      int latMin,
                                      double latSec,
                                      java.lang.String latDir,
                                      int longDeg,
                                      int longMin,
                                      double longSec,
                                      java.lang.String longDir)
convert GPS-Coordinates from DMS (Degrees, Minutes, Seconds) to DD (Decimal Degrees)

Parameters:
int - latDeg - latitude degree value
int - latMin - latitude minute value
double - latSec - latitude second value
String - latDir - latitude direction (north or south)
int - longDeg - longitude degree value
double - longMin - longitude minute value
double - longSec - longitude second value
String - longDir - longitude direction (west or east)
Returns:
double[] - double values for given latitude and longitude ([0]: latitude, [1]: longitude)
